description: This file is a test suite for the App component of a React application. It tests that certain navigation links ('Home', 'Search', 'Playlists') are rendered correctly within the app, using @testing-library/react for rendering and querying the DOM. It also imports routing and authentication context providers.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case named 'renders navbar links' that renders the App component within necessary context providers and verifies that specific navigation links are present.
